bug.author: chie8842
bug.summary: cannot install autokeras because of package dependency confliction
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h3>Bug Description</denchmark-h>
following package dependency is configured at setup.py <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jhfjhfj1/autokeras/blob/master/setup.py#L6>https://github.com/jhfjhfj1/autokeras/blob/master/setup.py#L6</denchmark-link>
<denchmark-code>install_requires=['torch==0.4.1', 'torchvision==0.2.1', 'numpy>=1.14.5', 'keras==2.2.2', 'scikit-learn==0.19.1', 'tensorflow>=1.10.0', 'tqdm==4.25.0'], </denchmark-code>
When execute pip install autokeras, following error is appeared. <denchmark-code>keras 2.2.2 has requirement keras-applications==1.0.4, but you'll have keras-applications 1.0.6 which is incompatible. keras 2.2.2 has requirement keras-preprocessing==1.0.2, but you'll have keras-preprocessing 1.0.5 which is incompatible. </denchmark-code>
It is because that tensorflow==1.11.0 is installed first and keras-applications >= 1.0.5 and keras-preprocessing > = 1.0.3 can installed with tensorflow==1.11.0. On the other hand, keras==2.2.2's dependency versions are keras-applications==1.0.4 and keras-preprocessing==1.0.2. tensorflow version should be defined as at <denchmark-link:https://github.com/jhfjhfj1/autokeras/blob/master/setup.py#L6>setup.py L6</denchmark-link> . <denchmark-code># before install_requires=['torch==0.4.1', 'torchvision==0.2.1', 'numpy>=1.14.5', 'keras==2.2.2', 'scikit-learn==0.19.1', 'tensorflow>=1.10.0', 'tqdm==4.25.0'],
# after install_requires=['torch==0.4.1', 'torchvision==0.2.1', 'numpy>=1.14.5', 'keras==2.2.2', 'scikit-learn==0.19.1', 'tensorflow==1.10.0', 'tqdm==4.25.0'], </denchmark-code>
<denchmark-h:h3>Reproducing Steps</denchmark-h>
Â Step1: curl <denchmark-link:https://gist.githubusercontent.com/chie8842/b3b9f3ea2d886bbb5aa5c903b9e42ee3/raw/e94cc375ca1265c66d4517a25a748f1e13a3de9d/Dockerfile>https://gist.githubusercontent.com/chie8842/b3b9f3ea2d886bbb5aa5c903b9e42ee3/raw/e94cc375ca1265c66d4517a25a748f1e13a3de9d/Dockerfile</denchmark-link> -o Dockerfile Step2: docker build -t autokeras -f Dockerfile . Step3: docker run -it --rm autokeras /bin/bash Step4: sudo pip install autokeras
